_source.content: Eric P Dollard Interviewed by Scott HenslerSome great info on all kinds of areas from music, to electricity, earthquakes and a lot more. 'One on one' interview that I've seen many times and always get something I missed before. Dollard is the only person to successfully repeat Tesla's experiments.If you're a musician or just a music lover, and wonder why music is so strange now; 27:45 min marker for some very interesting history of what music really is, and why we have 440 Hz now. There are a lot of people who think they understand these frequency changes (426Hz, 432 Hz, 440Hz) but I haven't heard anyone explain it as he does. It's not about frequencies, it's about numbers; Pythagorean.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xIRzYfbl5lU
_source.contentraw:
Eric P Dollard Interviewed by Scott Hensler

Some great info on all kinds of areas from music, to electricity, earthquakes and a lot more. 'One on one' interview that I've seen many times and always get something I missed before. Dollard is the only person to successfully repeat Tesla's experiments.

If you're a musician or just a music lover, and wonder why music is so strange now; 27:45 min marker for some very interesting history of what music really is, and why we have 440 Hz now. There are a lot of people who think they understand these frequency changes (426Hz, 432 Hz, 440Hz) but I haven't heard anyone explain it as he does. It's not about frequencies, it's about numbers; Pythagorean.

group.description: What kinds of events does the bible say we will see in the last days?  Can we see those events in today's news?  In this age of deception, can we even trust anything we hear on the news?  We're not about how many people we can get into our group here. If you are looking for deeper insights on where we really are on the prophetic timeline, then this may be a group you want to join.
